body: When you are in human form, you can take the shape of a specific individual.
name: Realistic Likeness
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Kitsune/New Racial Rules/Kitsune Feats/Realistic Likeness

sections.body: You can precisely mimic the physical features of any individual you have encountered. When you use your racial change shape ability, you can attempt to take the form of an individual, granting you a +10 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks made to fool others with your impersonation.
sections.name: Benefit
